short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XLogo is a logo manage tool for X.COM & TWITTER.COM.
short.zh_CN: XLogo 是一个用于 X.COM 与 TWITTER.COM 的logo管理工具

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is an auxiliary tool for Twitter and x.com websites, users can use it to modify the website logo of Twitter into their favorite pattern, for example, if you don’t like the current ‘X’ logo of Twitter, and prefer the original blue bird logo, you can use this tool to change it back, and users can also submit their own designed icons.
long.zh_CN: 该工具是针对推特和x.com网站的辅助工具，用户可以使用它修改推特的网站logo成自己喜欢的图案，比如如果不喜欢现在推特的'X' logo,而喜欢原来的蓝鸟logo,你可以通过这个工具把它换回来，同时用户也可以自己提交自己设计的任何图标。
